item.title: Raspberry Pi Case
item.description: This is a case for my Raspberry Pi, which I use to stream games from my CLX gaming PC to various locations in the house using Parsec. You can see more about that project here (link coming soon). There have been several iterations of this case. The first iteration, I had trouble with the sizing and spacing of the USB ports in the RPi model I used in Fusion360. As a result, the actual Pi did not fit in the case when printed.
